name: part_011
file: tmp_【#天音かなた3DLIVE】僕が主役でもいいですか？【ホロライブ】 [8lkam88qeZw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs 'Homura' by LiSA, with dramatic on-screen lyrics appearing on the background monitor.
Instrumental transition scene with stylized graphics on the screen, preparing for the next song.
Amane Kanata performs 'Gurenge' by LiSA, featuring energetic choreography and dynamic visual effects matching the song's intensity.

subtitles.original: 音を立てて 崩れ落ちてゆく
subtitles.english: With a roar, it all comes crumbling down

subtitles.original: 一つだけの かけがえのない世界
subtitles.english: This one and only, irreplaceable world

subtitles.original: 手を伸ばし 抱き止めた 激しい光の束
subtitles.english: I reached out and held tight to a fierce bundle of light

subtitles.original: 輝いて消えてった 未来のために
subtitles.english: It shone and then vanished, for the sake of the future

subtitles.original: 託された幸せと 約束を越えて行く
subtitles.english: I'll go beyond the happiness entrusted to me and the promise we made

subtitles.original: 振り返らずに進むから
subtitles.english: Because I will move forward without looking back

subtitles.original: 前だけ向いて叫ぶから
subtitles.english: Because I will look only ahead and scream

subtitles.original: 心に炎を灯して
subtitles.english: With a flame lit in my heart

subtitles.original: 遠い未来まで……
subtitles.english: To the distant future...

subtitles.original: 強くなれる理由を知った
subtitles.english: I've found the reason to be strong

subtitles.original: 僕を連れて進め
subtitles.english: Take me with you and move forward

subtitles.original:
紅蓮華
作詞：LiSA 作曲：草野華余子
subtitles.english:
Gurenge
Lyrics: LiSA  Composition: Kayoko Kusano

subtitles.original: 泥だらけの走馬灯に酔う
subtitles.english: Drunk on a mud-covered revolving lantern of memories

subtitles.original: こわばる心 震える手は
subtitles.english: My heart stiffens, my hands tremble

subtitles.original: 掴みたいものがある それだけさ
subtitles.english: There's something I want to grasp, that's all

subtitles.original: 夜の匂いに空睨んでも
subtitles.english: Even if I glare at the sky in the scent of the night

subtitles.original: 変わっていけるのは自分自身だけ それだけさ
subtitles.english: The only thing that can change is myself, that's all

subtitles.original: 強くなれる理由を知った
subtitles.english: I've found the reason to be strong

subtitles.original: 僕を連れて進め
subtitles.english: Take me with you and move forward

subtitles.original: どうしたって！消せない夢も 止まれない今も
subtitles.english: No matter what! A dream that won't fade, a present that won't stop

subtitles.original: 誰かのために強くなれるなら
subtitles.english: If I can become strong for someone's sake

subtitles.original: ありがとう 悲しみよ
subtitles.english: Thank you, sadness

subtitles.original: 世界に打ちのめされて 負ける意味を知った
subtitles.english: Beaten down by the world, I learned the meaning of defeat

subtitles.original: 紅蓮の華よ咲き誇れ！ 運命を照らして
subtitles.english: Gurenge, bloom in full! Shine on my destiny

subtitles.original: イナビカリの雑音が耳を刺す
subtitles.english: The noise of the lightning strikes pierces my ears

subtitles.original: 戸惑う心 優しいだけじゃ守れないものがある？ わかってるけど
subtitles.english: My bewildered heart, are there things I can't protect just by being kind? I know that, but...

subtitles.original: 水面下で絡まる善悪
subtitles.english: Good and evil tangled below the surface

subtitles.original: 透けて見える偽善に天罰
subtitles.english: Divine punishment for the hypocrisy seen through it

subtitles.original: Tell me why, Tell me why, Tell me why, Tell me why...
subtitles.english: Tell me why, Tell me why, Tell me why, Tell me why...

subtitles.original: I don't need you!
subtitles.english: I don't need you!

subtitles.original: 逸材の花より 挑み続け咲いた一輪が美しい
subtitles.english: More than a gifted flower, the one that kept challenging to bloom is beautiful

subtitles.original: 乱暴に敷き詰められた トゲだらけの道も 本気の僕だけに現れるから 乗り越えてみせるよ
subtitles.english: The path roughly paved with thorns appears only to the serious me, so I'll show you I can overcome it

subtitles.original: 簡単に片付けられた 守れなかった夢も
subtitles.english: Easily dismissed, even the dreams I couldn't protect

subtitles.original: 紅蓮の心臓に根を生やし この血に宿ってる
subtitles.english: Take root in my crimson heart, and dwell in this blood

subtitles.original: 人知れず儚い 散りゆく結末
subtitles.english: A secret, fleeting, scattering end

subtitles.original: 無情に破れた 悲鳴の風吹く
subtitles.english: Heartlessly torn, the wind of screams blows

subtitles.original: 誰かの笑い声 誰かの泣き声
subtitles.english: Someone's laughter, someone's crying

subtitles.original: 誰もが幸せを願ってる
subtitles.english: Everyone is wishing for happiness

subtitles.original: どうしたって！消せない夢も 止まれない今も 誰かのために強くなれるなら
subtitles.english: No matter what! A dream that won't fade, a present that won't stop, if I can become strong for someone's sake
